thread.title: Insta accounts of Janet Jacksons fans to be reinstated

title: Insta accounts of Janet Jacksons fans to be reinstated
text:
Insta accounts of Janet Jackson's fans to be reinstated 
Technology Industry News.Net (ANI) : Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
Good news for Janet Jackson's pissed off fans ,as Instagram spokesperson has said that only "repeat infringers" would have their accounts deleted. 
The photo -sharing app's spokesperson has further revealed that the bug which resulted in accounts getting deleted has been fixed and the sharing app is in the process of reinstating users who were incorrectly affected, TMZ.com reports. 
Earlier, Jackson's fans complained that their Instagram accounts were removed after they posted a video from one of the singer 'Unbreakable' tour. (ANI) More Technology Industry News
